Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: bats \bats\ (b[a^]ts), a. Crazy; insane; loony; demented; batty. [PJC]

bats adj : informal or slang terms for mentally irregular; "it used to drive my husband balmy" [syn: {balmy}, {barmy}, {batty}, {bonkers}, {buggy}, {cracked}, {crackers}, {daft}, {dotty}, {fruity}, {haywire}, {kooky}, {kookie}, {loco}, {loony}, {loopy}, {nuts}, {nutty}, {round the bend}, {around the bend}, {wacky}, {whacky}]
